alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:20PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cass County through 300 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Amenia, or 23 miles west of Fargo, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Hunter, Amenia and Erie. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
